mailContentVerifyDescription: Thanks for register ItemHub, type verify code to finish register process
mailContentSystemAutoSendEmail: ※ This email is automatically sent by the system, please do not reply, if you have any questions, please contact
mailSubjectOverPlan: Itemhub - You are over your storage limit
mailContentOverPlanTitle: You are over your storage limit , please to reduce your online storage limit
mailContentOverTopPlanTitle: 你的用量已經超過了最高的方案, 如果需要保存所有資料請與我們聯繫, 我們將提供更進階的方案
mailContentEarlyBirdRegisterDescription: 讓你久等了，ItemHub 服務已正式啟用。謝謝你之前在首波活動時，登記成為我們的早鳥用戶！
mailContentEarlyBirdRegisterDescription2: 前點選以下註冊按鈕，並註冊成為我們的會員，系統會自動將你的帳戶升級成進階方案
mailSubjectGetNewPremiumUser: Itemhub - We have a new premium user
